8 RobotinoBaseComponent::RobotinoBaseComponent(const ros::NodeHandle& parentNodeHandle)
9  : Component(parentNodeHandle) { // TODO _nh??
10  publisher_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 1);
11  odometry_subscriber_ = nh_.subscribe( "/odom", 1, &RobotinoBaseComponent::odometryCallback, this );
12  MoveForwardCapabilityCallback move_forward_capability_callback
13  = std::bind(&RobotinoBaseComponent::act, this, std::placeholders::_1);
14  auto move_forward_capability_ptr = std::make_shared<MoveForwardCapability>(move_forward_capability_callback);
15  capabilities_vector.emplace_back(move_forward_capability_ptr);
16 }
17 
18 RobotinoBaseComponent::~RobotinoBaseComponent() {
19 }

21 Capability& RobotinoBaseComponent::find_capability_by_name(const std::string& capability_name) {
22  for (auto capability_ptr : capabilities_vector) {
23  if (capability_ptr->is_named(capability_name)) {
24  return *capability_ptr;
25  }
26  }
27 }
28 
29 void RobotinoBaseComponent::act(MoveForwardCapabilityParameters& parameters) {
30  dist_moved_ = 0.0;
31  start_x_ = curr_x_;
32  start_y_ = curr_y_;
33  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
34  ROS_INFO("Sending move command to robotino");
35  while(nh_.ok() && dist_moved_ < parameters.distance) {
36  dist_moved_ = sqrt(pow(curr_x_ - start_x_, 2.0) + pow(curr_y_ - start_y_, 2.0));
37  if (dist_moved_ < parameters.distance) {
38  // go on moving
39  msg_forward.linear.x = 0.2;
40  }
41  else {
42  msg_forward.linear.x = 0.0;
43  }
44  publisher_.publish(msg_forward);
45  ros::spinOnce();
46  loop_rate.sleep();
47  }
48  ROS_INFO("Robotino arrived at its goal");
49 }
50 
51 void RobotinoBaseComponent::odometryCallback(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr& msg) {
52  curr_x_ = msg->pose.pose.position.x;
53  curr_y_ = msg->pose.pose.position.y;
54 }
